content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Facility at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0), extracting iron ore and dropping it into a wooden chest at position (-14.5, -48.5).
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5), storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0), smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5), transferring items from the chest to the furnace.

### Coal Mining and Smelting Facility at Position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0), extracting coal and dropping it into a wooden chest at position (41.5, -80.5).
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5), storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0), smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5), transferring items from the chest to the furnace.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to Insufficient Inventory Items
- Ensure that you have the necessary items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a structure. For example, attempting to insert iron ore into a furnace without having iron ore in your inventory will result in an error.

### Errors when Furnaces are Full
- Regularly check and empty the output slots of furnaces to prevent them from becoming full, which stops production.

### Errors when Chests are Full
- Ensure that chests have enough space to store incoming resources. Empty them regularly to avoid halting mining operations.

### Errors when Inserters are Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that inserters have a steady supply of items to transfer. Check the source and destination inventories to ensure smooth operation.
